summary: In Medicine Bend, a crooked businessman has the town mayor and sheriff in his pocket while his henchmen raid the wagon trains passing through the region.
cast: Randolph Scott|James Craig|Angie Dickinson|Dani Crayne|James Garner|Gordon Jones|Trevor Bardette|Don Beddoe|Myron Healey|John Alderson|Harry Harvey|Robert Warwick|George Bell|Richard Bellis|Marjorie Bennett|Arthur Berkeley|Lane Bradford|Marshall Bradford|Chet Brandenburg|Jerry Brown|Dee Carroll|Fred Carson|Tom Coleman|Ann Doran|Dan Dowling|Jesslyn Fax|Sam Flint|Michael Forest|Herman Hack|Chick Hannan|Carol Henry|Daryn Hinton|Ed Hinton|George Huggins|Fred Kelsey|Nancy Kulp|Ann Kunde|Harry Lauter|Robert Lynn|Rory Mallinson|Philo McCullough|George Meader|Troy Melton|Tom Monroe|Howard Negley|Jack Parker|George Pembroke|Gil Perkins|Jack Perrin|Buddy Roosevelt|George Ross|Henry Rowland|John Roy|Syd Saylor|Marjorie Stapp|Dale Van Sickel|Philip Van Zandt|Sailor Vincent|Guy Wilkerson|Tom Wilson
title: Shoot-Out at Medicine Bend
